security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only documentation and workflow instructions. No executable code, scripts, network calls, or file system access is embedded in the skill file. Capabilities are controlled entirely by the Notion MCP tools installed in the user's environment.

content.user_title: Research Notion content and create structured reports
content.value_statement: Researching information scattered across multiple Notion pages takes time and risks missing key details. This skill provides a structured workflow to search, fetch, and synthesize Notion content into organized briefs, summaries, comparisons, or comprehensive reports with proper citations.
actual_capabilities: Search Notion pages using targeted queries via Notion MCP tools
Fetch and skim Notion pages to extract key facts, metrics, and claims
Synthesize findings from multiple sources into organized themes
Create structured documents in Notion using appropriate templates
Add inline citations and references linking to source pages
Update existing Notion pages with new findings or changelogs
limitations: Requires Notion MCP tools to be configured and authenticated
Cannot access Notion without proper MCP connection and OAuth login
Output quality depends on the organization of source Notion pages
Does not create content in external applications outside of Notion

use_cases.title: Synthesize meeting notes
use_cases.description: Gather scattered meeting notes from Notion and create consolidated research briefs or executive summaries.

use_cases.title: Create comparison documents
use_cases.description: Research options across Notion databases and produce comparison reports with tradeoffs and recommendations.

use_cases.title: Compile technical reports
use_cases.description: Pull technical documentation from multiple Notion sources and synthesize comprehensive reports with citations.

prompt_templates.title: Quick research brief
prompt_templates.scenario: Fast fact-finding on a specific topic
prompt_templates.prompt: Research [TOPIC] in our Notion workspace. Search for relevant pages, fetch the key information, and create a quick brief with the main findings and source links.

prompt_templates.title: Topic deep-dive
prompt_templates.scenario: Comprehensive research on a complex subject
prompt_templates.prompt: Conduct a thorough research investigation on [SUBJECT] using Notion. Find all relevant pages, extract facts and evidence, and produce a comprehensive report with sections for background, findings, analysis, and recommendations.

prompt_templates.title: Option comparison
prompt_templates.prompt: Compare [OPTION A] vs [OPTION B] using information from our Notion pages. Search for pros, cons, specifications, and user feedback. Create a comparison document with a decision matrix and clear recommendations.

prompt_templates.title: Update existing research
prompt_templates.scenario: Adding new findings to existing documents
prompt_templates.prompt: Research [NEW_TOPIC] in Notion and add the findings to our existing [DOCUMENT_NAME] page. Include proper citations and update the references section.

output_examples.input: Research our competitor analysis documentation and create a summary brief with key findings and recommendations.

best_practices: Start with targeted Notion searches and confirm scope with users before fetching content
Capture direct quotes and citations during research to ensure accurate attribution
Use the format selection guide to choose the right output type (brief vs summary vs comprehensive)
Group findings by themes or research questions before synthesizing into documents
anti_patterns: Fetching too many pages without a clear research scope or search strategy
Skipping the citation step and leaving sources unattributed
Using the wrong format for the task (e.g., comprehensive report for quick facts)
Failing to link back to source pages in the references section

faq.question: Does this skill work without Notion MCP configured?
faq.answer: No. This skill requires Notion MCP tools to be installed and authenticated via OAuth login before it can search or fetch Notion content.

faq.question: What Notion MCP tools does this skill use?
faq.answer: The skill uses notion-search, notion-fetch, notion-create-pages, and notion-update-page to interact with your Notion workspace.

faq.question: Can I create documents in other apps besides Notion?
faq.answer: No. This skill is designed specifically for creating structured documentation within Notion using the Notion MCP tools.

faq.question: Is my Notion data sent to external servers?
faq.answer: All data stays within Notion's infrastructure. The skill only orchestrates how content is fetched, synthesized, and written back to your connected Notion workspace.

faq.question: What formats can this skill produce?
faq.answer: The skill supports four formats: quick brief (fast readout), research summary (single-topic), comparison (tradeoffs), and comprehensive report (executive-ready).

faq.question: How does this compare to manual Notion research?
faq.answer: The skill provides a structured workflow that ensures consistent sourcing, proper citations, and format-appropriate outputs. It reduces time spent on document organization while improving traceability.
